title: "Yorick is fine and this rework is a gutting, riot don't ruin my champ"
body: Incoming posts with similar titles/content when people qq'd about sion and poppy being ruined from their unique identity of cancerous gameplay.

replies.body: I don't think you are going to find many people who were happy with the old Yorick.  Heck, even the online guides haven't been updated in a long time for him.. nobody plays him.
I play him and am happy with his old kit
I thought that about Sion but then I saw 10+ posts saying ap sion is ruined and riot is ruining diversity

Trust me you are going to love him XD 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/QkTGEpzn-riot-community-new-yorick-is-a-tad-bit-busted-xd
I'm wondering what Inverted Composer's gonna do now.
